ai.title: AI Model
ai.noModels: No models available. Please check API key configuration.
ai.modelHint: Select AI model for conversations. Model list is dynamically loaded from API.
ai.advancedDescription: Different types of background tasks can use different models to balance cost and quality.
ai.backgroundModelHint: Used for extracting info when importing artworks from web pages. Claude Sonnet is recommended for structured data extraction. GPT-4o also works well.
ai.usingDefaultFastModel: Currently using default fast model (Claude 3.5 Haiku)
ai.searchExpansionModelHint: Used for translating Chinese search terms to English. Defaults to Haiku for speed and low cost. Choose a larger model for more accurate translation.

export.title: Data Export
export.jsonDescription: Export all data (artworks, editions, locations, history)
export.artworksCsvDescription: Export artwork info, can be opened in Excel
export.editionsCsvDescription: Export all editions with status info
export.exportHint: Regular JSON backups are recommended to prevent data loss

profile.title: Project
profile.hint: Used on PDF covers, export filenames, and copyright. Studio name will be "{{studioName}}".

apiKeys.title: External API
apiKeys.description: Allow external AI agents to query your inventory
apiKeys.name: Key Name
apiKeys.keyCreatedWarning: Copy this key now. It will not be shown again.
apiKeys.confirmRevoke: Revoke this API key? External agents using it will lose access.
apiKeys.hint: API keys provide read-only access to your inventory data for external AI agents and integrations.
